document.masterDocTitle: The ant genus Strumigenys Smith, 1860 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in western North America North of Mexico

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The ant genus Strumigenys Smith, 1860 (Hymenoptera: Formicidae) in western North America North of Mexico

bibRefCitation.author: Emery, C.
bibRefCitation.refString: Emery, C. (1906) Studi sulle formiche della fauna neotropica. XXVI Bullettino della Societa Entomologica Italiana, 37, 107 - 194.

subSubSection.paragraph: Distribution . Argentina to Guyana ; introduced in USA , Mexico , most Caribbean Islands and Portugal ; in eastern USA from Florida to North Carolina and west to Louisiana ; in western USA occurs in California and Texas .
